attributes.action: STOP THE CAR INSURANCE RIP OFF NOW!!
attributes.additional_details:
1) its time the goverment stepped in to sort out the insurance companies.
2) give everyone a chance of fair prices.
3) give the young drivers a chance of a fair price ,before cripoling them with outragous policy prices.

rejection.details: The insurance industry is already regulated by the Financial Services Authority, which reports to H M Treasury.
